extendedInfo.description: Digital Clock is a widget that is one of the many beautiful clocks that will be placed by me. The application is available in 2 sizes.**************************************************************The applications are located Leadbolt advertising (which is not a VIRUS or MALWARE! Not install nothing!)Please do not place a 1 (star). If you do not like it simply uninstall it!You can REMOVE ALL ADS FOR FREE !!! In apps you can click Remove Ads .**************************************************************The clock in the size 2x1 displays hour and minute. The second shows the size of 3x1 extra seconds. The clock allows you to select 12/24 hour time.After pressing on the widget, you can go to the alarm.Widget is lite, and dont dry your battery. The clock turns off with the screen when you turn off device.PREMIUM OPTIONS:- Remove ADS- When you click widget, you open directly Alarm. [don't go to app and next to alarm]The clock is also resistant to the task killers. Do not stop when you force stopping the application.To add widget press: Home->Menu->Add->Widgets->Digital Clock WidgetAny opinions would be appreciated. If you find a problem, please write what the problem is, and enter the device name.Write to me: android@fratczak.org (For comments, unfortunately I can not answer). If you want various color, write to me on e-mail, and tell me which color you prefer :)The applications are located Leadbolt advertising (which is not a virus or malware!)Please do not place a 1 (star). If you do not like it simply uninstall it!

reviews.title: Spam
reviews.comment: This app spams notifications to your notification bar for all sorts of nasty stuff. Sneaky and malicious. DO NOT INSTALL. Apps like this should be banned from the market. Report this developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice little app but...
reviews.comment: This would be a great little app were it not for the fact that it comes bundled with a little packet of joy called air push. Air push is an invasive ad pushing service which will inject adverts into your phones notification bar. Its extremely annoying and I had to use air push detector app to find the program it came bundled with. Closing the host programme (in this case digital clock) will not stop air push from forcing ads onto your device. The best solution is to remove the host programme; digital clock.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good clock but
reviews.comment: Have pay for pro if you want it to go straight to your clock! isnt that what a widget is suposed to do?!
reviews.author: john gingell

reviews.title: SPAM!!
reviews.comment: ads everyday on my notification bar...  annoying!

reviews.comment: Very nice, neat looking widget!
reviews.author: Kelley Wilkins

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I like that it displays the seconds. Ads arent a problem as they can easily be cleared and dont return for a long time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exvellent Clock
reviews.comment: Excellent! Easy to read, but does not take up a lot of space. Easy access to the alarm, timer, stop watch and world clock. Optional seconds (I keep the seconds off to save juice). The clock does not use much juice. I use it with a seperate large date widget. They also have other colors(should you prefer).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Good app

reviews.title: Great until it spams
reviews.comment: No idea what this developer had in his head at the moment they decided spamming your notifications would be a great idea. I uninstalled.
